creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: light gold fabric with floral designs in metallic blue and gold; fringe on one short side and on one long side; two ties, both in corners where fringe ends; tassel hanging from corner where fringe on both sides meet; fringe is gold metallic thread; about 4" section of fabric on opposite end of fringe is same design, different tones; light green cotton backing
title: Sash (or furnishing fabric)
